definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: However, she started to write her essay only one day before the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她臨到截止日期的前一天才開始動筆。

sentences.english: And the word of the LORD came unto me the second time, saying, What seest thou?
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的話第二次臨到我說，你看見什麼。

sentences.english: Let bad luck come down on both the houses.
sentences.chinese: 讓壞運降臨到這兩個家庭吧。

sentences.english: The kind of fame that hounded Pollock's life and death never quite came to Still.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞波洛克生與死的那種名望從未降臨到史蒂爾身上。

sentences.english: He began to imagine all kinds of frightening things that could happen to him.
sentences.chinese: 他開始想像各種可能降臨到他頭上的可怕的事情。

sentences.english: There is no place that you can go where God’s love isn’t.
sentences.chinese: 你不管到哪裏，神的愛都能臨到你。

sentences.english: Because of their guilt, God's anger came upon Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 因他們這罪，就有忿怒臨到猶大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Like a fluttering sparrow or a darting swallow, an undeserved curse does not come to rest.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀往來，燕子翻飛，這樣，無故的咒詛也必不臨到。

sentences.english: shall there be evil in a city, and the LORD hath not done it?
sentences.chinese: 災禍若臨到一城，豈非耶和華所降的嗎。

sentences.english: The word of the LORD that came to Joel the son of Pethuel.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的話臨到毘土珥的兒子約珥。

sentences.english: And the word of the LORD came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的話臨到提斯比人以利亞說。

sentences.english: But the word of the LORD came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying.
sentences.chinese: 但耶和華的話臨到神人示瑪雅說。

sentences.english: I saw hope dawning on the faces of Cornwallis and Krishna.
sentences.chinese: 我看到希望的表情降臨到了康沃和克里斯的臉上。

sentences.english: He will come upon rulers as upon mortar, As the potter treads the clay.
sentences.chinese: 他必臨到掌權的，好像臨到灰泥，彷佛窯匠踹泥一樣。

sentences.english: He will come upon rulers as upon mortar, As the potter treads the clay.
sentences.chinese: 他必臨到掌權的，好像臨到灰泥，彷佛窯匠踹泥一樣。

sentences.english: "It came up on me gradually, over time, " Jason says.
sentences.chinese: “它是漸漸降臨到我頭上的，”傑生說。
